snippet.title: Ex Sun Journalist Reacts To The Johnny Depp Trial | This Morning
snippet.description:
The bitter battle of the exes continued to be played out in public yesterday as Johnny Depp and Amber Heard were forced to come face to face at London’s High Court. The Pirates of the Caribbean star is suing The Sun over an article that referred to him as a "wife beater" in 2018 - allegations which he denies. And with the trial expected to last three weeks, and witness testimony expected to be given by Depp's former partners Vanessa Paradis and Winona Ryder -  Matthew Wright, ex Sun 'Bizarre' journalist, and libel lawyer Alex McCready join us to reflect on the first explosive day in court.
Broadcast on 08/07/20
Subscribe now for more! http://bit.ly/1JM41yF

Dr Zoe and Dr Ranj answer all your health questions, stay stylish with Gok Wan's fabulous fashion, be beautiful with Bryony Blake's top make-up tips, and save money with Martin Lewis.
